meanings.definition: The capacity to unite with or react to another substance.
meanings.sent1: The valences of the atoms determine how they can bond together.
meanings.sent2: In chemistry, understanding the valences of elements is crucial for predicting their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The valences of the molecules decided to have a party and bond together.
meanings.sent4: The valences of the elements danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The valences of the substances were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.

meanings.definition: The combining power of an element.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the valences of elements to understand how they interact with each other.
meanings.sent2: The valences of different elements determine the types of compounds they can form.
meanings.sent3: The valences of the elements played a game of tag, trying to combine with each other.
meanings.sent4: The valences of the elements were like magnets, attracting and bonding with each other.
meanings.sent5: The valences of the elements were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
